contentList.content: Bury targets in an avalanche of mud.
Shoot [1] Water dart, each dealing [1]. They always hit their target.
A beam of brilliant light sears and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUNBEAM">Blinds</LSTag> all creatures in its path.
Until the spell ends, you can recast Sunbeam without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Call forth a torrent of water that cuts through all creatures in it's path, possibly making them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleed</LSTag>.
Until the spell ends, you can recast Sunbeam without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Create a rain storm that has been touched by your deity harming your enemies while healing you half of the damage dealt.
Heavily Obscures and Blinds creatures within.
Heavily Obscures and Blinds creatures within.

Hurl 3 compressed water bolts, each dealing [1] to anyone within [2] of the impact and potentially knocking them <LSTag Type='Status' Tooltip='OFF_BALANCED'>Off Balance</LSTag>. Each bolt leaves a wet surface of [3].
This spell can be cast while you are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILENCED">Silenced</LSTag>.

Crush a creature in a sphere of water. Your target takes [1] and you can push or pull the sphere each turn to deal [2]. Your target's movement is halved, suffers <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and incoming attacks have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. Lasts for 3 turns. Duration and damage increase with upcasting.
cannot move and receives a -[1] penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>
hf4d3f156ga6aeg45f8g8898gdbb03d43a025:5:Up to [2] creatures receive a -[1] penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Call forth a furious, swirling mass of water that thrashes anyone who enters, possibly leaving them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CRIPPLED">Maimed</LSTag>.

A violent cone of water fills the air. Anyone inside the whirlwind takes [1] each turn. Applies <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN_DEEPWATER">Difficult Terrain: Deep Water</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WET">Wet</LSTag>
Takes [1] per turn and can be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CRIPPLED">Maimed</LSTag>.

Protect an ally from damage done by water spells and increase their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 5. They become Fire resistant and immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>.
Receives +5 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and is immune to damage from water spells.
Surrounding creatures take [1] per turn, yours and their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is halved.
Conjure a storm of razor-sharp rain, slicing through creatures and causing them to <LSTag Type='Status' Tooltip='BLEEDING'>Bleed</LSTag>.

Surround yourself in a pool of raging water that hinders others from getting near. Dismiss the spell to trigger a flash flood that pushes creatures away [1], dealing [2] and knocks them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>
Summon a geyser; when walked on by a foe, it will erupt and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISE">Surprise</LSTag> unsuspecting victims.

Tear the very essence from your foe and siphon half as many <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>. Make up to 6 attacks with upcasting, each directed at a different target. No target can be hit more than once, with each beam dealing [1].

Draw moisture from the environment, concentrating it into a vertical beam of crushing force that creates a wet surface in a [2] radius, possibly pushing creatures away [1] and knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Summon a whirlpool that creates a wet surface with a [2] radius, can pull in creatures in [1] from the surrounding area and possibly knock them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.

Allow a creature to be unaffected by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, it's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [1] and it's <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to falling <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> on ice and grease.

Unaffected by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [1] and is <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to falling <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> on ice and grease.
Unleash a precise, blade-like stream of water. If the target and a nearby enemy are <LSTag Type='Status' Tooltip='WET'>Wet</LSTag>, fire an additional beam that deals [1].
Shoot out a bolt of water, wetting the target.

Release a powerful wall of water becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WET">Wet</LSTag>, creatures that fail a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> are pushed back [1] and fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Creature takes [1] per turn, yours and their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is halved.
Fortify a creature from impending harm: increase its <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 1.

Fortify a creature from impending harm: increase its <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 1.

Takes [1] per turn and cannot move. It suffers <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and incoming attacks have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Unleash a precise, blade-like stream of water. If the target and a nearby enemy are <LSTag Type='Status' Tooltip='WET'>Wet</LSTag>, fire an additional beam that deals [1].
Target isn't affected by water spells.

Receives +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and is immune to damage from water spells.
Receives +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and is immune to damage from water spells.

+1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, is immune to damage from water spells, prevented from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Fire damage.

Protect up to 2 allies from damage done by water spells and increases their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 1. They become Fire resistant and immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>.

Protect up to 3 allies from damage done by water spells and increases their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 1. They become Fire resistant and immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>.

Protect up to 4 allies from damage done by water spells and increases their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 1. They become Fire resistant and immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>.

Protect up to 5 allies, or more with upcasting, from damage done by water spells and increases their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 1. They become Fire resistant and immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>.

+15 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, is immune to damage from water spells, prevented from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Fire damage.

Push or pull the target that is trapped inside the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CRUSHING_BUBBLE_DS">Drowning Grip</LSTag> by [1].
Pull the creature [1] closer to you.
Push the creature [1] away from you.
Immune to damage from water spells.
